bibl.title: [Coin Hoards 2008. Ancient Hoards.] A Parcel of Coins from the Kôm el-asl Hoard I.
bibl.note: Description of 86 coins belonging to the National Museums Scotland that were part of a hoard of 4426 coins found by the EEF in 1896. The hoard consisting almost entirely of tetradrachms was found buried in three amphorae under the flooring of a house in Umm el-Atl (the ancient Bacchias).
bibl.seg: Nicholas M.McQ. Holmes, [Coin Hoards 2008. Ancient Hoards.] A Parcel of Coins from the Kôm el-asl Hoard I.

Description of 86 coins belonging to the National Museums Scotland that were part of a hoard of 4426 coins found by the EEF in 1896. The hoard consisting almost entirely of tetradrachms was found buried in three amphorae under the flooring of a house in Umm el-Atl (the ancient Bacchias).
